page.title: 07Blackler Barton Landscove
page.content: This the largest farm and includes a {riding }stables for{recreation}hunting and hacking . The Hayllors and some of their eight children run the farm with the help of 2 other workers.One being employed in the milking parlour .There are 280 cattle ,120 of them dairy cows that produce about 500,000 litres of{milk}each year.There are 174 sheep and in Spring time everyone has to help with the lambing and much sleep is lost.The 23 horses and ponies are ridden by the owners and hirers some go to Holne for the summer season for hiring to pony trekkers on Dartmoor .The farm totals some 600 acres ,about 150 acres undercereals and the rest mostly managed grassland. Peacocks,geese,ducks and hens roam about and there are two obedient{sheep {dogs}that watch any visitors carefully when they are not working.
